class_notes: Prerequisite: Criminal Law & Evidence; Criminal Procedure is preferred.
course_description: This course will explore the issues surrounding an arrest, a criminal investigation, criminal charges, sentencing, appeals, and post-trial issues that criminal defense lawyers deal with.
